meanings.definition: Small, two-winged insects that resemble mosquitoes.
meanings.sent1: The gnats buzzed around the light in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally inhaled a gnat while walking outside.
meanings.sent3: The gnats seemed to be having a party on the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with a cloud of gnats, like a tiny storm.
meanings.sent5: The gnats danced in the air, creating a delicate ballet of wings.

meanings.definition: Annoying pests that swarm around people and animals.
meanings.sent1: The gnats kept bothering us during the picnic.
meanings.sent2: I had to swat away the gnats while fishing by the lake.
meanings.sent3: The gnats seemed to think my ears were the best place to hang out.
meanings.sent4: The gnats were like tiny paparazzi, following us everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The gnats were relentless, always buzzing around our heads.

meanings.definition: A group or cloud of tiny flying insects.
meanings.sent1: A gnat of insects hovered above the stagnant water.
meanings.sent2: The gnat of bugs moved as one, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent3: The gnat of tiny creatures looked like a moving shadow in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The gnat of flying insects darkened the sky momentarily.
meanings.sent5: The gnat of tiny wings hummed together in perfect harmony.
